api module¶

api.api_change_password()[source]¶

Changes the users password

:param JSON {

“new_password”: “<new password>”

}

:returns JSON {

“success”: bool

}

api.api_delete_user()[source]¶

Handles register request

:param JSON {

“username”: “<username>”

}

:returns JSON {

“success”: bool

}

api.api_echo()[source]¶

Echo the received message back to client

api.api_get_simulation_data()[source]¶

Requests historic simulation data for further analysis

:param JSON {

“columns”: list[str], “row_constraints”: list[str]

}

:returns JSON {

“content” : csv file

}

api.api_login()[source]¶

Handles login request

:param JSON {

“username”: “<username>”, “password”: “<password>”

}

:returns JSON {

“registered”: bool, “password_correct”: bool, “access_token”: “<token>”, “role”: “data_analyst | simulation_expert | administrator”

}

api.api_register()[source]¶

Handles register request

:param JSON {

“username”: “<username>”, “password”: “<password>”, “role”: “<data_analyst | simulation_expert | administrator>”

}

:returns JSON {

“success”: bool, “already_registered”: bool, “invalid_role”: bool

}

api.api_start_simulation()[source]¶

Starts a simulation with the given parameters

:param JSON {

“population_size”: int, “simulation_seed”: int, “generation_count”: int, “strategy”: int, “aep”: float, “elite_count”: int, “alien_count”: int, “weights”: list[float]

}

:returns JSON {}

api.login(username: str, password: str)[source]¶
api.register(username: str, password: str, role: str)[source]¶
